item.title: About
item.description: Alcide Kubernetes Advisor In this freely-available edition of Alcide Kubernetes Advisor which scans Kubernetes cluster hygiene and security best practices. Alcide’s commercial customers have access to additional scanning features, such as policy driven kubernetes scan, automatic updates, consuming reports from multiple clusters in a single dashboard, and enforcing policies using adminssion controller. Claim your ‘Free Forever’ Account
